readable.title: 3003011417_79b49ff384
readable.content: A group of children are sitting on a raft wearing blue helmets and carrying paddles . A group of kids paddle a raft made of sticks and rope . Children paddle on a craft . Children wearing life preserves and helmets , and holding an oar , sit on a raft in water . several young boys wearing blue helmets and blue and red life jackets on a raft
